projects.title: Game Magic
projects.description: This project leverages Python and Pandas to analyze and visualize video game playtime data, providing insights into gaming habits and trends across different platforms.

services.title: Medical Interpretation (Spanish-English)
services.description: With 2 years of experience in virtual medical interpretation, I provide accurate and professional Spanish-English interpretation services. I assist in facilitating clear communication between medical professionals and patients, ensuring that medical information is understood and conveyed accurately.

aboutpara: I‚Äôm a student developing strong skills in Python, currently exploring tools like Pandas, NumPy, and scikit-learn through personal projects. I‚Äôm also learning JavaScript and React to broaden my understanding of web development. While my long-term goal is to grow into a tech-focused role, I‚Äôm open to customer service positions that offer meaningful experience and the opportunity to grow within a team.

resume.tagline: I'm a medical interpreter and pursuing a master's in Computer Engineering
resume.description: I'm a medical interpreter, helping bridge communication between healthcare professionals and patients. At the same time, I'm pursuing a master's degree in Computer Engineering, where I aim to merge my passion for technology with my experience in communication.

experiences.bullets: As a remote medical interpreter with Propio, I provided high-quality Spanish-English interpretation services in a variety of medical settings. My role involved facilitating communication between patients and healthcare professionals, ensuring accuracy and cultural sensitivity in delivering medical information. With over 2 years of experience, I have developed strong skills in medical terminology and client interaction, contributing to better healthcare outcomes for non-English speaking patients.
In this role I facilitated clear and accurate communication between patients and healthcare providers, ensuring confidentiality, cultural sensitivity, and adherence to medical terminology.
